==============
Installation
==============

Prerequisites
-------------
PhysiLearning is so far only supported on Linux. C++ compiler, python and ZMQ are required.

Installation
------------
As so far repository is private please fork git repository `PhysiLearnig <https://github.com/sergiyayf/PhysiLearning>`_
and execute:

.. code-block:: bash

    pip install -e .
